categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Lady of Coins was a female individual who had dust-shrouded acolytes on the Outer Rim planet Crucival. Like other factions on the planet, she gave her own reasoning on why she wished to claim Crucival as her own. The human soldier Hazram Namir served the Lady of Coins sometime between 4 BBY and 0 BBY.
The Lady of Coins was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
